roleset.name: forceful persuasion
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, coerce.01. Corresponds to VNcls force-59.

example.name: tricky arg0 and arg2
example.text: Neither the private coercion of capitalism , nor the state coercion of socialism is found in a communist society .
example.note: Here, because of the context (the alternation with 'state'), we can see that 'private' is referring to the private sector, which are the agents of the coercion.

example.name: args 0 and 2 again
example.text: Neither the private coercion of capitalism , nor the state coercion of socialism is found in a communist society .
example.note: It might be tricky to tell the difference between an arg1 and an arg2, but capitalism and socialism are results, so arg2.

example.name: with arg1
example.text: Indigenous women's narratives also tell of their coercion into various forms of unpaid or low-paid labor...
example.arg: into various forms of unpaid or low-paid labor
